description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of two front lights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no front rooflights and 1no gable window to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B & Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that condition 5 of planning permission 23/01262/HOU are hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

PLEASE READ CAREFULLY: On the 1st May 2024 the Council adopted a new Householder Local List. Please ensure that your application submission includes all the necessary documentation as required by the new Local List and complete and submit a "Householder Checklist - Section 3" to confirm that you have provided all mandatory documents.The new Householder Local List and Checklist can be obtained via the council's website: https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/download/261/validation-requirements-for-planning-applicationsThe LPA will not conduct any validation checks until the correct Checklist has been submitted. Upon receipt of a completed Checklist, the application will be assigned to a Validation Officer to review. Please do not simply state N/A anywhere in the checklist without a written justification. If you need to make any changes to your application please try to do this via the Planning Portal website where possible. If that is not possible please send amended documents via the email address quoted in this letter.
